name: Serious Heat: Chipotle-Bacon Salsa
description: Editor's note: Gretchen VanEsselstyn of Chile Pepper Magazine, will be dropping by each week with a recipe for heat freaks. This week, though, in honor of the Super Bowl, she'll have a recipe a day before the big game. Where...

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the bacon into 1/4-inch cubes. In a frying pan over medium heat, warm the oil. Add the bacon, lower the heat, and cook over medium-low heat for about 7 minutes, until lightly browned. Remove from the pan, and drain well on paper towels. Drain tomatoes, then place in a bowl, and toss with onion and chipotle purée. Stir in drained bacon pieces, lime juice and pepper, and serve.
